ygData.subject: Re: Ad&D and EQ - Argument on Warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: Jynxx, You are right about the ability of rangers to use plate, and that they cannot cast spells while in plate but you left this out as well. Rangers cannot
ygData.messageBody:
Jynxx,

You are right about the ability of rangers to use plate, and that they
cannot cast spells while in plate but you left this out as well. Rangers
cannot use their sneak ability in plate either. Just thought id add to the
ranger bashing. =) Tree huggers....bah.

Lothaniel/Rayne

> ----------
> From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 1:20 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Ad&D and EQ - Argument on Warriors
>
> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> One flaw in that. Rangers (as well as paladins) COULD wear plate. Rangers
> just could not cast spells in plate mail. For all intents and purposes the
> ranger was EXACTLY the same as a fighter, except a few VERY minor things.
> They get 1d8 hit die instead of 1d10 like a fighter, yet they still get
> the
> constitution bonus. They still get the strength bonus, but were limited in
> weapon specialization. They got the same number of attacks per round,
> except
> at higher levels and even then it was only a half-attack (every other
> round). Look closely at any AD&D table except experience. They group
> Fighters, Rangers and Paladins all into one group, subclassed the
> 'fighter-type'. But I am not trying to argue the fact of rangers vs.
> warriors vs. paladins..... Just warriors vs. damage of other classes.
> maybe
> just having some really sweet warrior only weapons would be better than
> adding new skills? I mean a warriors strength is his weapon, and warriors
> are supposed to have the greatest variety of weapons, right? Oh well, I
> guess it's becoming a moot point. I am starting to get very opinionated
> (too
> late hehe) about this subject, mainly because I like to solo sometimes and
> at 10th level I really couldn't do that anymore because monsters were
> hitting me for twice as much damage as I was hitting them for, and twice
> as
> fast. Ok, I am done....sorry for the mindless banter ;-}~
>
> Jynxx
>
>
